name: DRINKURWATER
cleanBio:
Germany born, Atlanta based Kevin Flum aka DRINKURWATER is an upcoming music producer who started the project in 2017. From producing heavy dubstep, to wet bass music, Kevin has gained the support and likes of greats like Excision, 12th Planet, TVBOO, Liquid Stranger, Blunts & Blondes, and many more. Breaking through with his song “OH F\*CK” with Rated R, he has followed up with solid releases and huge bookings nationwide. You can expect a diverse set that will keep you moving and sipping on that good water.

Stay hydrated my friends.
